az: from my mind 2 the depths of my soul i yearn 2 achieve all of my goals and all of my free time will be spent on the 1s i miss i will lament  i am not a perfectionist but still i seek perfection i am not a great romantic but yet i yearn 4 affection  eternally my mind will produce ways 2 put my talents 2 use and when im done no matter where ive been ill yearn 2 do it all again.
